io.minAR.util

Class Crypt

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.minAR.util.Crypt

  • public class Crypt
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class, mainly helps in encryption of the archives. Contains helper methods for byte[] encryption
    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    nikhil
    See Also:
    Cipher, SecretKey

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Crypt.ENC_OBJECT
      A Helper class, to temporarily club the secret key and the encrypted bytes

      • encrypt

        public static Crypt.ENC_OBJECT encrypt(byte[] data)
        Encrypts the given data through a timely generated key.
        Parameters:
        data - the byte[] to be encrypted
        Returns:
        an Crypt.ENC_OBJECT containing the encrypted data as raw and the secret key

                             javax.crypto.SecretKey secretKey)
        Decrypt the given byte array using the secret key
        Parameters:
        encrypted - the encrypted bytes
        secretKey - the secret key needed for decryption
        Returns:
        the decrypted bytes

        Returns:
        the secret key
